alert.note: Alert for Hardin (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 2:54AM CST until January 12 at 3:15AM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM CST FOR CENTRAL HARDIN...NORTHWESTERN CRITTENDEN...SOUTHWESTERN UNION AND WEST CENTRAL WEBSTER COUNTIES... At 254 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northwest of Marion, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Sturgis, Cave-in-Rock and Elizabethtown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
